Question: Nanjing Kuailun Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Nanjing Kuailun Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: CES 2024 Highlight

- Chinese technology companies showcasing latest achievements in AI, next-gen display, autonomous driving, and robots at CES 2024
- Intelligent devices powered by generative AI and IoT expected to drive global consumer electronics industry growth
- TCL demonstrated over 120 intelligent hardware including mini-LED TVs, AI chips, smartphones, AR goggles, and vehicle-mounted displays
- Hisense unveiled latest ULED TV and laser display technology
- Lenovo showcased over 40 new AI-powered devices and solutions
- Xpeng AeroHT showcased pilotless flying car, eVTOL aircraft
- Chinese companies leading in AI, AR, VR, and autonomous driving technologies
- Xreal showcased AR-enabled products in partnership with Qualcomm and BMW
- Focus on AI application in consumer electronics, intelligent devices, and electric vehicles
- Chinese tech companies leading in mature and emerging categories, reflecting strengths and innovative capabilities
Summary_cn:
南京快论智能科技有限公司

产品：CES 2024亮点

- 中国科技公司在CES 2024展示了人工智能、下一代显示、自动驾驶和机器人等领域的最新成果
- 由生成式人工智能和物联网驱动的智能设备预计推动全球消费电子行业增长
- TCL展示了超过120款智能硬件，包括mini-LED电视、人工智能芯片、智能手机、增强现实眼镜和车载显示器
- 海信推出了最新的ULED电视和激光显示技术
- 联想展示了超过40款新的人工智能设备和解决方案
- 小鹏AeroHT展示了无人驾驶飞行汽车、电动垂直起降飞机
- 中国公司在人工智能、增强现实、虚拟现实和自动驾驶技术方面处于领先地位
- Xreal与高通和宝马合作展示了支持增强现实的产品
- 重点关注人工智能在消费电子、智能设备和电动车辆中的应用
- 中国科技公司在成熟和新兴领域处于领先地位，展示了其实力和创新能力
